BaseConfig.description:
The simplest table configuration can be used to show all SPARQL result set projection variables.
The SPARQL projection variable name is used as column header. IRIs will be rendered as resolvable links using the `<semantic-link>` component or as a simple string otherwise.

currentPage.description:
In controlled mode sets current page in the table;
in uncontrolled mode only sets initial page.

linkParams.description: Add parameters to URLs. This option is applicable only to default cell templates.

noResultTemplate.description:
<semantic-link uri='http://help.metaphacts.com/resource/FrontendTemplating'>Template</semantic-link> which is applied when the query returns no results
**The template MUST have a single HTML root element.**

numberOfDisplayedRows.description: Number of rows to show on the one page

prefetchLabels.description:
Prefetches labels for all resource IRIs in the data to support sorting and filtering
by resource labels.

showLabels.description: Determines if the table should automatically fetch and display labels for resource IRIs.

showLiteralDatatype.description: Enable displaying datatypes of literals. This option is applicable only to default cell templates.

ColumnConfig.description: More advanced configuration that can be used to restrict the set of columns to be visualized, to modify the column headings or to provide custom cell visualization templates

columnConfiguration.description: List of columns to display. If specified table shows only columns explicitly specified in the configuration

ColumnConfiguration.description:
Table column configuration which allows to override column header or cell visualization template.
Either `variableName` or `cellTemplate` is required to properly display column content.

cellTemplate.description:
Custom cell visualization <semantic-link
   uri='http://help.metaphacts.com/resource/FrontendTemplating'>template</semantic-link>.
Template has access to all projection variables for a single result tuple.
**The template MUST have a single HTML root element.**

variableName.description: SPARQL projection variable name that this column is bind to.

showFilter.description: Whether or not to display table filter

showTableHeading.description: Determines if the table heading should be displayed

RowConfig.description: The most advanced table configuration that provides the ability to customize the rendering of an entire table row via tuple templates.

tupleTemplate.description:
<semantic-link uri='http://help.metaphacts.com/resource/FrontendTemplating'>Template</semantic-link> for the whole table row. Can be used to have visualizations different from the standard, e.g grid of thumbnails.
The template has access to all projection variables for a single result tuple
**The template MUST have a single HTML root element.**
